content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to execute read_file command with a specific filename, but it returned "no such file or directory" error. I executed write_to_file command with a specific filename and text again, and it returned success. I attempted to execute execute_shell command with a specific command line, but it returned syntax errors. I executed list_files command with a specific directory again, and it returned a list of files. I attempted to execute execute_python_file command with a specific filename, but it returned "Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed." I executed append_to_file command with a specific filename and text, and it returned success. I executed read_file command with a specific filename again, and it returned the text appended twice. I attempted to execute replace_in_file command with a specific filename, old text, new text, and occurrence index, but it returned "No matches found." I executed write_to_file command with a specific filename and text again, and it returned success. I attempted to execute execute_shell command with a specific command line, but it returned syntax errors. I executed list_files command with a specific directory again, and it returned a list of files. I attempted to execute write_to_file, read_file, execute_python_file, and execute_shell commands again, but they all returned the same errors as before.
"""

Latest Development:
